mapper.select: SELECT no, id, area, dtype, dsex, dkg, dcolor, dcharacter,category, tel, dname, dage,FILENAME,FILESIZE, dbday, count, num FROM (SELECT no, id, area, dtype, dsex, dkg, dcolor, dcharacter,category, tel, dname, dage,FILENAME,FILESIZE, dbday, count, rownum as num FROM(SELECT no, id, area, dtype, dsex, dkg, dcolor, dcharacter,category, tel, dname, dage,FILENAME,FILESIZE, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_reply WHERE bno=b.no) as count FROM board_dog b) )WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_dog (no, id, area, dtype, dsex, dkg, dcolor,category, dcharacter, tel, FILENAME, FILESIZE,dname ,dage ) VALUES(board_dog_no_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{area}, #{dtype}, #{dsex}, #{dkg}, #{dcolor},#{category}, #{dcharacter}, #{tel} ,#{filename}, #{filesize},#{dname},#{dage} )
mapper.select: SELECT no,dname,dtype,area,filename,category,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday FROM board_dog WHERE ${fs} LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%'
